text:
Hey everyone! I have a tip for yall.

Don't you hate it when you're coding a custom module and the site's theme doesn't apply to your module?

There's a simple workaround: Inspect any page on your site and copy the  <link> tag for your main.min.css file. Then paste it into your module's HTML and bam! Your module now has the site's styling applied.

(SEO: module style not showing, preview module style, module css theme not working)
